description: Super easy, quick and delicious coconut prawns. These are crunchy and tasty and can be served multiple ways. The double crumb process is what adds the extra crunch. Served here with a simple garnish, it’s great for sharing with a few people.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Spiced Panko Coconut Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 large banana prawns, cooked, de-shelled and tails kept on

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the panko and coconut in a bowl, ready to dip. One prawn at a time, coat in flour, then egg wash, then panko-coconut mixture. For a second time, dip back into the egg wash and then into the crumb mix again. One prawn at a time, flour, egg, crumb, back into the egg wash and then into the crumb mix.
Place onto a tray lined with baking paper.
Bake for 6 – 8 minutes or until prawns are cooked through. 5. Season with some extra sea salt once out of the oven, and serve with tartare sauce and lime wedges on the side.
